item.title: About me
item.author: sakh1979@gmail.com
item.description:
Few things about me:

  • I specialize in portrait photography, I like working on:

    1. high school senior shoot
    2. engagement shoot
    3. head shots

  • I am a strobist photographer, meaning I use small pocket strobes to take a well lit, balanced, and appleaing pictures

  • I like working on new and interesting ideas

If you like my work, and would like to work with me, please feel free to contact me.
